ComicInfo.Summary: In order to stop the interdimensional madman Damocles, Deathblow sacrificed his own life. Join us now for the funeral. This is a FINAL Issue no Deathblow fan should miss as the WildStorm Universe says goodbye to a hero. Featuring appearances by Backlash, WetWorks, Taboo, Gen 13, and the WildC.A.T.s.

ComicInfo.Title: "It didn't matter that it happened on the moon."
